# curveBasis

**Instance Property**

Controls the curve basis function, determining how Metal interpolates the control points.

## Declaration

```swift
var curveBasis: MTLCurveBasis { get set }
```

## Discussion

Defaults to `MTLCurveBasisBSpline`.
